translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ本読も、本
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then, let's read a book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 適当な所に腰を下ろしたランスの足下に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset clung playfully at Lance's feet as he sat down somewhere suitable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絵本を片手にリセットがじゃれついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, holding a picture book in one hand, frolicked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、つまんなかったらやめるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, if it gets boring, I'll quit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「工場長、バッテリーOKです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Factory chief, the battery is OK!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 7号機、これから始動に入ります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unit 7 is about to start up!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、お願いね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mm, please take care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、後は奥の2両か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, the other two at the back, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弟子に指示を出しながら、自らも戦車の最終調整を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While giving instructions to his apprentice, he himself also carried out the final tank adjustments.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次々とこなしていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He completed them one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はー、忙し忙し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haah, busy, busy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細部のアジャストは運んだ後にしよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make the fine adjustments after transporting it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スパナ片手に、格納庫の最奥にある戦車に近づいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wrench in hand, he approached the tank at the very back of the hangar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うるさいなぁ……何？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So noisy... What is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃっ……きゃあああぁぁぁっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kya... Kyaaaa!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その戦車のハッチから、一人の少年が顔を出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the hatch of that tank, a boy poked his head out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だっ、誰！？　泥棒！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Who!? A thief!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれっ、人間……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh, a human...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、どうしたどうした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's going on? What happened?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと一行が、悲鳴を聞きつけ駆けつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the group heard the scream and rushed over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、魔人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, a demon.
Eh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このガキか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it this kid?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パイアール！　なんでこんな所に……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Piarl! Why are you in a place like this...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、サテラ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……そっか、人類軍がこれを取りに来たって事か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I see, so the human army came to take this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わ、私のチューリップ3号に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-W-What have you done to my Tulip No. 3?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何をしたの！　離れて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What did you do!? Stay away!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、これ作ったの君なの？　へぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, you made this? Huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間が面白いもの作ったって聞いたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard humans made something interesting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと来てみたんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I came to take a look...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールは殺気立つランスたちを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Piarl didn't seem to care about the hostile Lance and others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気に留める風でもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nor did he pay attention,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハッチから降りて戦車を見上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He climbed down from the hatch and looked up at the tank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これ、いいなあ。いい作りだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...This is nice. It's well made.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………あ、あらそう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Oh, is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとは話が分かるのかしら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe you understand a little...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。作りは完全にオモチャだけど、発想がいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah. The construction is completely like a toy, but the idea is good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大砲と装甲と自走部分だけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just the cannon, armor, and mobility parts...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、それだけで事足りるよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, that's all you need.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、オモチャ……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A toy...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついつい、人工知能とか関節とか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I tend to add artificial intelligence and joints and all that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺、足しちゃうんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I end up adding things around there, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっか、消耗品だもんね。単機能でいいんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, it's a consumable. Single-purpose is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいよこれ、割り切ってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is good, it's pragmatic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機能を絞って簡略化か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Limiting the functions and simplifying, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり考えた事無かったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never really thought of that before.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……そっか、人類軍がこれを取りに来たって事か

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これ、いいなあ。いい作りだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...This is nice. It's well made.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………あ、あらそう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Oh, is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとは話が分かるのかしら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe you understand a little...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。作りは完全にオモチャだけど、発想がいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah. The construction is completely like a toy, but the idea is good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大砲と装甲と自走部分だけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just the cannon, armor, and mobility parts...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、それだけで事足りるよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, that's all you need.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、オモチャ……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A toy...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついつい、人工知能とか関節とか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I tend to add artificial intelligence and joints and all that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺、足しちゃうんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I end up adding things around there, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっか、消耗品だもんね。単機能でいいんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, it's a consumable. Single-purpose is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいよこれ、割り切ってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is good, it's pragmatic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機能を絞って簡略化か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Limiting the functions and simplifying, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり考えた事無かったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never really thought of that before.
